tool_description: API to self host Torrent Hunt Bot
name: TorrentHunt
title: TorrentHunt

api_list.name: Config
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://torrenthunt.p.rapidapi.com/api/config/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "torrenthunt.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://torrenthunt.p.rapidapi.com/api/config/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "torrenthunt.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
